segments.contentZh: 從前，有一隻可愛的小兔子，住在森林裡。
segments.contentEn: Once upon a time, there was a cute little rabbit living in the forest.

segments.contentZh: 小兔子很孤單，它想要找一些朋友。
segments.contentEn: The little rabbit was lonely and wanted to find some friends.

segments.contentZh: 我要去找朋友！我想和大家一起玩！
segments.contentEn: I want to find friends! I want to play with everyone!

segments.contentZh: 小兔子來到河邊，看見了一隻小鴨子。
segments.contentEn: The little rabbit came to the river and saw a little duck.

segments.contentZh: 你好！我可以和你一起玩嗎？
segments.contentEn: Hello! Can I play with you?

segments.contentZh: 當然可以！我正要去游泳，一起來吧！
segments.contentEn: Of course! I'm going swimming, come along!

segments.contentZh: 後來，他們又遇到了松鼠和小鳥，大家都成為了好朋友。
segments.contentEn: Later, they met a squirrel and a bird, and everyone became good friends.

segments.contentZh: 從那天起，小兔子每天都和朋友們快樂地玩耍。
segments.contentEn: From that day on, the little rabbit played happily with friends every day.
